DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose investigate tolerability/safety repeat weekly dos AZD8848 administer intranasally seasonal allergic rhinitis patient .
DOC.brief_title: Tolerability/PoP Study Allergic Rhinitis After Intranasal Administration AZD8848
DOC.criteria: Patients history birch and/ timothy grass pollen induce seasonal allergic rhinitis least previous 2 year ( verified positive skin prick test ) Patients need treatment nasal symptom pollen season Clinical relevant disease abnormality ( past present ) allergic rhinitis Symptomatic perennial allergic nonallergic rhinitis A history asthma
